scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch

watch-ts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
watch-ts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve"
watch-ts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"

watch-ts.build: npm run build-stylus && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
watch-ts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Stylus,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-stylus" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve"
watch-ts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Stylus,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-stylus" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"

watch-ts.build: npm run build-less && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
watch-ts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Less,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-less" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"

scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
